email_draft.subject: Application Update: Senior Software Engineer - Backend
email_draft.body:
Dear Sarah Chen,

Thank you for your application for the Senior Software Engineer - Backend position. We are currently reviewing your application and will be in touch shortly.

- Clarify the candidate's experience with version control systems and CI/CD pipelines.
- Verify the educational background to ensure it meets the job requirements.

Best regards,
HR Team

qa_suggestions: Clarify the candidate's experience with version control systems and CI/CD pipelines.
Verify the educational background to ensure it meets the job requirements.

match_results.requirement: Strong proficiency in Python, Java, or Go
Solid understanding of relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and NoSQL databases (MongoDB, Redis)
Experience with version control systems (Git) and CI/CD pipelines
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Knowledge of system design patterns and best practices
